channel.title: win on Analyst
channel.description: Recent content in win on Analyst

item.title: AWS Configuration
item.description: Default Configurations By default, SSH 22 and RDP 3389 are closed, but these are suggested to be opened when creaing them, warning how dangeroud this is.

item.title: Linux Config
item.description: Linux SSH Files /home/%username%/.ssh/authorized_keys /home/%username%/.ssh/known_hosts /home/%username%/.ssh/config /home/%username%/.ssh/id_* (defualt) and just /home/%username%/.ssh/ for all the keys

item.title: ‚öôÔ∏è macOS Configurations
item.description: Most of the configirations on macOS are stored in plist files. Unlike Windows with its one repo called the Registry üò± there is no single place with all the plists.

item.title: ‚öôÔ∏è Windows Registry
item.description: Registry is a repository for settings on a Windows machine. Prior to Windows NT, ini files were used.
